document_title: Amniotic embolism (amniotic embolism): Causes, signs and prevention
subsection_content:
Studies show that there is currently no method to prevent this dangerous obstetric complication. However, the development of ultrasound technology and regular prenatal examinations can detect, warn and treat abnormal signs early, preventing unfortunate consequences. (4)
“The general principle for a healthy pregnancy and safe birth lies in good pregnancy management. Pregnant women need to have regular check-ups as prescribed by doctors to detect risky pregnancies early, take timely and effective treatment measures, and ensure the health of both mother and fetus" - Associate Professor. Dr. Luu Thi Hong recommended.
Get regular prenatal checkups as prescribed by your doctor to have a healthy pregnancy and safe birth
Not only are they professionally skilled and experienced, Tam Anh General Hospital doctors have successfully treated millions of dangerous obstetric complications such as pre-eclampsia, eclampsia, uterine rupture, amniotic fluid embolism, hemorrhage and especially twin blood transfusion. In particular, doctors at Tam Anh General Hospital are dedicated and accompany pregnant women through the gentlest labor, fully enjoying the joy of welcoming a new member.

Above is all the information you need to know about amniotic fluid embolism in women. This is a serious obstetric phenomenon that requires careful attention to prevent.
